programme.title: Song Hae : 1927
programme.desc: Loved and admired by 50 million people, Song-hae is the longest running MC in Korea. Behind the stage of the country¡¯s favorite show host, there is pain and loneliness, hidden for nearly 70 years of his showbiz life. A life that has aged along with the modern history of Korea. Through his life, we meet the heart-wrenching father of our time.

programme.desc: The founding father of Korea Dangun¡¯s last descendent Kang Dan is the No.1 snack shuttle in school. Kang Dan must break his one rule and awaken in order to protect his family and loved ones from the bullies.

programme.title: I AM HERE
programme.desc: The police investigator "Seondu" was once stabbed in his lungs while hunting down a murderer but was miraculously brought back to life through an organ transplant. He returned to the front lines of investigation and was tracking down a serial killer "Kyujong". In the process, he finds out through the donation coordinator "Ahseung" that "Kyujong" got an organ transplant from the same donor as himself and that the donor was a murderer he arrested himself in the past... A hot-blooded investigator vs. an outraged murderer. The extreme chase between two men entangled in cruel fate begins!

programme.title: ATV Heroes
programme.desc: The crew is out for a ride on one of the best trails in New Brunswick as we formulate what is an ATV Hero?

programme.title: STV Storytelling & Upcoming Cain's Quest
programme.desc: This week on STV, Jeff talks about his favorite sled category, mid-size sleds. On the topic of favorites, Jeff thinks up some locations to go and talks about the up coming Cain's Quest Race.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: REVIT! Twins Cup
programme.desc: It came down to one last race in the REV'IT! Twins Cup Championship to decide who took the title, and the riders gave it their all at New Jersey Motorsports Park

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: We now visit Spain for another hair-raising spectacle. Teruel once again hosted the 38th edition of Baja España Aragón Trofeo AVATEL. Our next stop is Brazil! The Stock Car Pro Series, Brazils premier racing series, has been providing non-stop race action for 40 years. The 2022 season is in full swing and the stakes are high.

programme.title: FIM World SidecarCross
programme.desc: FIM Sidecar World Championship is the international sidecar racing championship

programme.title: Pressure to Rise - Round 9: COTA & New Jersey
programme.desc: "Pressure To Rise" Episode 9 chronicles a tough round for the Medallia Superbike riders who raced at Circuit of the Americas in Austin, Texas, during a triple-digit heat wave. Despite the adversity, Richie Escalante achieved a career milestone. And then. it was on to New Jersey Motorsports Park for the final race weekend of the season, but with the added challenge of Tropical Storm Ophelia deciding to pay a visit and make track conditions extra-challenging for MotoAmerica's premier riders.

programme.title: Australian V8 Superboat Championships
programme.desc: A weekly series showcasing the very best in aquatic motorsports

programme.title: Milestones/RVing Pilots
programme.desc: They say “the process of learning to fly makes you better at… everything.” So while the obvious goal seems to be getting a license, there are actually many other little goals you can achieve and benefit from along the way. Then we introduce a new host: a popular RVer who explores the curious overlap of those who long to explore in the air as well as on the road.

programme.title: Formula Americas Network - F4 Championship - Round 14
programme.desc: FORMULA AMERICAS NETWORK “FAN”Formula Americas Network (FAN) is proud to present the F4 U.S.Championship and the Formula Regional Americas Championship for F3 cars in Mexico, Canada, and the USA.

programme.title: iRacing
programme.desc: Experience the world of e-sports. Sim Racing is at the forefront of the e-sports world and this series includes the biggest races with professional commentary, the latest gear tried and tested, the best software reviewed, all the latest news on the sport and it’s pursuit of the ultimate simulated driving experience. From NASCAR to F1, Rally to Drifting, Sim Racing has it all!

programme.title: Tearing it Down
programme.desc: Sam and Doug continue the tear down of the 57 Thunderbird. Kevins Chevelle gets its new Heartbeat. 1971 Chevelle gets new emblems and light bezels. Sam tackles heat and sound as he installs a new carpet in his Integra.

programme.title: Out With the Old, In With the New
programme.desc: Sam and Kevin install a New 5spd manual transmission in the Chevelle. Sam Continues to tackle heat as he installs a DEI Turbo Shield. The 71 Chevelle gets new Mirrors to compliment the new bezels and emblems.

programme.desc: Today, collector and enthusiast Todd Blue takes us through his private Porsche car collection. In the Porsche world, it can seem like there’s nothing truly new under the sun — no car undiscovered, no collection so obscure, but we found a pretty secret collection.

programme.title: Rod Ends on Hot Rods
programme.desc: Sam and Doug approach the dashboard and components to get them ready for polish. Kevins Chevelle gets new headers and 3” exhaust system. Bob and Sam install new rod ends on a gorgeous 1932 Ford Hot Rod. First to get it done, Livernois comes on with their 2021 F-150 My Calibrator tuner and intercooler.

programme.desc: STV heads to Eagle River, Wisconsin with Ultimax to hit the trails and spectate the 60th World Championship Snowmobile Derby.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Mission King of the Baggers
programme.desc: The penultimate Mission King Of The Baggers race of the season with the title on the line for the riders in this uniquely American Big Twin Battle.

programme.title: Monster Jam! / Kaiafas Battle
programme.desc: On this episode we reveal the making of Monster Jam, the most action-packed motorsports event! Our next stop is the highly-anticipated Kaiafas Battle!

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Daytona 200
programme.desc: The 81st running of the Daytona 200 is one that will be talked about for a long time. It appeared that one rider might win it by a wide margin, until circumstances changed dramatically. Don't miss a moment of the race when you watch it.

programme.title: Cessnas: 172 & 340
programme.desc: To most people, the name “Cessna” has become synonymous with “small airplane.” And it’s no wonder. The Cessna 172 is the most produced aircraft in history and has almost certainly been flown by nearly every pilot! But there’s definitely more to Cessna – as the much larger and more capable 340 proves.

programme.title: 13 Ghosts
programme.desc: When Cyrus Zorba (Donald Woods) and his poverty-stricken family inherit an old mansion, they can't believe their good luck. However, not long after they move in they realize that the house is haunted by 12 ghosts and run by a housekeeper (Margaret Hamilton) who works in the dark arts. Though the ghosts are intent on killing a member of the family, the Zorbas insist on staying in the house because they have learned that a large fortune is hidden somewhere inside it.

programme.title: Hilang Akal
programme.desc: Akibat terdesak untuk mencari duit kahwin, seorang lelaki nekad menculik seorang datin bagi mendapatkan wang tebusan. Keadaan menjadi huru hara apabila datin yang diculik itu adalah bakal ibu mertuanya!

programme.title: Misteri Sofa Lama
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri membeli sebuah sofa lama di kedai barangan terpakai namun perwatakan suaminya mula berubah dan mula obses terhadap sofa tersebut

programme.title: Kuntom
programme.desc: Kuntom, gadis kampung yang berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk membuka sebuah kedai hijab. Dia terpaksa bersaing dengan Faris, tuan gedung besar di depan kedainya.

programme.title: Ana Anak Ibu
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Ana, is diagnosed with cancer as a child, motivating her parents to try to fulfill her last request.

programme.title: Aku, Mawar & Makhluk Asing
programme.desc: Apabila tunang yang garang tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang wanita yang lemah lembut, maka Amar jatuh cinta kembali pada tunangnya, Faz. Namun tanpa disedari sebenarnya alien telah menakluk jasad Faz

programme.title: Penjara Seorang Isteri
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kegigihan dan ketabahan seorang wanita, Salmah yang menghidapi barah payudara tahap dua menuntut fasakh daripada suaminya, Zaid setelah suaminya mensia-siakan pengorbanannya selama ini.

programme.title: Rasuk
programme.desc: Kejadian histeria di sebuah sekolah berasrama telah menarik minat seorang wartawan untuk mengupas kisah mistik di sebalik kejadian histeria yang membawa kepada terbongkarnya sebuah rahsia.

programme.title: Dan..Aku Jatuh Cinta
programme.desc: Indah tidak dapat menerima kenyataan yang ayahnya telah berkahwin baru. Dia berkenalan dengan Kerk, jurulatih selam yang membawanya meneroka lautan, dan akhirnya jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Pintu No. 9 Masjid Nabawi
programme.desc: Kisah benar Allahyarham Dato' S. Roomai Noor dan Allahyarhamah Datin Umi Kalsom mengenai saat-saat akhir mereka bersama ketika mengerjakan umrah. Kisah kasih sayang dan kesetiaan hingga hujung nyawa.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani & Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Cari Calon Suami
programme.desc: Jihan dah nak kahwin? Tapi dengan siapa? Mari kita tengok calon-calonnya.

programme.title: Balapan
programme.desc: Kisah empat orang remaja yang telah menjadi musuh sejak sekian lama di lapangan balapan acara pecut 100meter peringkat daerah Selangor dan akhirnya menjadi sahabat seperjuangan.

programme.title: Bidadari
programme.desc: Seorang gadis yang terperangkap di antara dua dunia percintaan, sebuah cinta suci dari alam realiti dan juga cinta yang penuh misteri dan kehitaman dari alam mistik.

programme.title: We’ll be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: We’ll be back at 6.00am

programme.title: 30 Hari Membunuh Cinta
programme.desc: After a messy breakup with her lover, Rara tries to forget everything about her lover in 30 days.

programme.title: Wau Kasih
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kisah pengorbanan seorang ayah untuk membantu keluarga namun ianya disalah erti oleh anak-anaknya

programme.title: Kita Bukan Anjing
programme.desc: Kisah konflik mengenai dua adik beradik yang berlainan bapa. Mereka saling benci membenci di antara satu sama lain dan kebencian semakin membara apabila mereka meningkat dewasa.

programme.title: Hantu BlueRey
programme.desc: Joni and Zain are partners in distributing pirated discs in Kuala Lumpur. In one video, a girl appears to have been killed and found dead. Joni wants to take a chance to make a profit on the video.

programme.title: Pentas
programme.desc: Musa adalah seorang pemuda bijak tetapi antisosial, dan dia telah diberi amanat oleh ketua kampung untuk menjayakan 'Malam Bintang Gemilang' di kampung mereka bersama dengan 3 orang pemuda bermasalah.

programme.title: Hisyam & 3 Hantutiyers
programme.desc: 3 hantu cuba untuk membantu seorang lelaki amnesia selepas terlibat dalam sebuah kemalangan. Mereka dibantu oleh seorang bomoh bernama Pak Tam.

programme.title: Ooops! Terlajak Nikah
programme.desc: Seorang jejaka ingin mengahwini seorang gadis muda dan menghantar rombongan meminang. Tiba hari pernikahan dan rupa-rupanya dia telah tersalah meminang dan mengahwini seorang janda yang lebih tua darinya!

programme.title: Kontena Ana
programme.desc: In 2001, divorce sent by text message was legalised. This is the story of how a woman, on the brink of joining her husband abroad, receives one such text message and has to deal with the sudden shock.

programme.title: Pengantin Lari Culik Artis
programme.desc: When a father decides his daughter, Fammy, should marry his best friend's son, Fammy secretly hatches a plan to kidnap her favorite celebrity and go off with him instead.

programme.title: Hantu Judi
programme.desc: Jason seorang tahi judi menjumpai mayat wanita beserta wang tunai yang banyak di sisi mayat. Dia mengambil wang tersebut namun roh wanita tersebut mengekornya dan meminta bantuan untuk mencari pembunuhnya.

programme.title: Rongples Rongtaim
programme.desc: Kisah komedi mengenai sebuah kemalangan yang berlaku di simpang jalan di antara 3 kereta melanggar Raja Report Malaysia telah menyebabkan huru hara berlaku.

programme.desc: Two people from different social class and different professions meet in a lift. They form all sorts of perception about each other in their own heads. That is, until they get trapped in the lift...

programme.title: Yonder
programme.desc: Jae-Hyun feels emptiness after his wife dies until one day, he receives a message from Yi-Hoo asking him to live with her at a place called Yonder. Despite being confused, he decides to travel there.

programme.title: Yonder
programme.desc: Jae-Hyun feels emptiness after his wife dies until one day, he receives a message from Yi-Hoo asking him to live with her at a place called Yonder. Despite being confused, he decides to travel there.

programme.title: Yonder Finale
programme.desc: Jae-Hyun feels emptiness after his wife dies until one day, he receives a message from Yi-Hoo asking him to live with her at a place called Yonder. Despite being confused, he decides to travel there.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Love Guide for Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brother's debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: The Hot-blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband's funeral.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn't last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Love Guide for Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Going by the Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter is put in a coma after a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: the Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: This movie is about a corrupt detective and a father who is falsely charged with murder. The chase begins when the father clears himself of the false accusation and plots his revenge on the detective.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brother's debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: The Swordsman
programme.desc: Joseon's greatest swordsman and royal guard, Tae-yul, who went into hiding after the fall of King Gwanghae.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.
